item.title: Bitcoin Grants, Design & Crypto Patents (COPA)
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/211/ Stephan Livera: Steve. Welcome back to the show. Steve Lee: Thank you so much. Glad the glad to be here, Stephan Livera: Steve. I see you guys have been very busy over at Cquare Crypto. Since we last spoke, you’ve been doing a lot of work in different, in different arenas as well. You’ve got the grants going, design and this crypto patent stuff. So tell us a little bit about you know, what you’ve been doing over the last few months.
